channel.title: admin on Tri V Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Tri V Nguyen

item.description: Hello! I’m a fourth-year Ph.D. candidate in Astrophysics at the MIT Kavli Institute. I’m interested understanding the galaxy formation process and the dark matter density profiles of galaxies. At MIT, I’m working with Prof. Lina Necib on various projects: Applying graph neural network on infer the dark matter density profiles of dwarf galaxies from their stellar kinematics Using kinematics of accreted stars to characterize the galaxy accretion history of the Milky Way Constructing synthetic Gaia DR3 surveys from Milky Way-like galaxies in the FIRE simulation In the first two year of my Ph.
